docs.lead_paragraph: A CHINESE herb that has been used for centuries to treat upper-respiratory problems is becoming increasingly popular with young people, who are using it as an alternative to illegal recreational drugs.

headline.main: Concern Grows Over Herb That Promises A Legal High

docs.snippet: A CHINESE herb that has been used for centuries to treat upper-respiratory problems is becoming increasingly popular with young people, who are using it as an alternative to illegal recreational drugs.

byline.original: By MARIAN BURROS and SARAH JAY
